sentences.en: She is known to have liberal views on divorce and contraception.
sentences.cn: 大家知道，她对于离婚和避孕持开明的观点。

sentences.en: With today's more efficient contraception women can plan their families and careers.
sentences.cn: 有了当今更为高效的避孕方法妇女们能够规划好自己的家庭和事业。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, wide-ranging contraception programs do not usually reduce this rate.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，广泛的避孕方案通常不会降低这一比率。
